name: Allete
description:
SOURCE CODE

DEVLOG COMING HERE SOON

Allete (All-et) is a chill, isometric puzzle game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "Stronger Together"

You control 1-2 cubes that can merge together to beat levels (stronger when they're together) and can split apart and be controlled together (stronger when they work together).

WASD or arrows to move.

Blue cubes can split into green cubes by hitting spikes, and green cubes can combine to form a blue cube when they occupy the same square.

I made the art with Adobe Illustrator, the code with Unity and Jetbrains Rider, the sounds with my voice and Adobe Audition, and the music with FL Studio.

I used this color palette

It's important for you mac users to read the install instructions; otherwise you won't be able to play it 

I will probably be continuing this post-jam to release either on mobile or steam, so feedback is GREATLY APPRECIATED as well as subscribing to my channel where I'll be posting a devlog for this jam, as well as a future devlog series about me continuing this game.

oh, and please give this 5 stars if you enjoy :)
